issue.title: [CF 1361] Only some groups appearing
issue.body:
So I know this could be something coming when the addon is updated for 7.1.5 but since I logged in only 1 out of the 5 groups I use for my shadow priest appears. The other groups are still there in my character pane and the anchors are still where they should be as well, but no icons appear. Any ideas?


> Posted by CurseForge user Madfrick | Imported from CurseForge issue #1361 | Raw

comments.body:
Same issue here

Edited Jan 10, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user loclay2

You most likely have Lua errors turned off but this is related to the same issue here:

 

https://wow.curseforge.com/projects/tellmewhen/issues/1360

Edited Jan 10, 2017
